description: The synonym token filter allows to easily handle synonyms during the analysis process.

properties.name: synonyms
properties.description: Sets the synonyms configuration in the specified format.

properties.name: synonyms_path
properties.description: Sets a path (either relative to config location, or absolute) to a synonyms file configuration.

properties.name: ignore_case
properties.description: Sets flag indicating that tokens case should be ignored.

properties.name: expand
properties.description: Sets flag which enables synonyms further tokenization.

properties.name: tokenizer
properties.description: Sets the logical / registered name of the tokenizer to use for synonyms tokenization.
